content.detailedDescription: I was coming home when i noticed a silver object in the with blinking lights on the front of it. it was in the western sky blinking red lights then blueish white lights. i took a picture and a few seconds afterwards it drifted away, moving left if looking at the picture. i saw it near comly rd and the roosevelt boulevard in philadelphia pa.
content.summary: Saw object with blinking lights in western sky, fley away after taking picture

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i are retired and we often sit outside in lawn chairs at the front of our house on warm evenings. we live under the flight path of airliners that take off and land at denver international airport, so aircraft sightings are common, but this sighting was not an airliner. we concurred that it was something we could not identify (not a balloon, or known type of aircraft, probably not a military drone, and was not a bird because it was too high up and did not resemble any kind of bird we are familiar with due to the roughly dark cubic shape it had. this object was moving about the speed of an airliner coming in to dia and kept a straight path moving directly north from our vantage point over denver. we saw it first at about 70 degrees from the horizon and quite high overhead. object kept moving north and eventually disappeared behind a tree line. object appeared to be rotating or changing shape slightly. at one point it did look something like a plane, but for the most part it was dark cubic non-reflective with appendages at the bottom edge. strangely enough, my wife heard about another ufo report on channel 9 later that evening, but no details were available regarding what a pilot had reported as a sighting in close proximity to his aircraft. that sighting apparently was a near-miss collision to the pilot's plane on the same day, so we don't know if what we saw was the same thing or not. the object we saw was completely silent, and there were no other objects or aircraft in the sky at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: Dark cube-shaped object that appeared to change shape slightly and had faint appendages along bottom edge

content.detailedDescription: We were walking our dog when we noticed two red-orange globes of light flying in the sky in what looked like a circling path of a single area, yet they would disappear for a number of minutes then reappear. we checked back in 15 minutes, and they had disappeared. i have never seen anything like this in my life. these were definitely not airplanes, helicopters, or any type of drones. very shocked and at a loss of words at what i just saw.
content.summary: Red-orange colored globes of light seen in sky around 845 p,m. while walking dog

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and myself, i was driving were traveling home from manchester to liverpool on the a59 east lancashire road in 1989 approx 1am or later.
when ahead we noticed a craft hovering above some buildings ahead of us we new something was weird as it was so large as we approached we talked rubbish to each other harrier jump jet, helicopter,the only things we knew that can hover 
but we new it wasn't as we got close to it my car cut out and we stopped directly underneath it but i was having trouble with my carb anyway so i wouldn't say or claim a spielberg moment.
i lay on top of my friend both looking up at it out the car window.
you could see it was made of a dull grey to silver metal with lights all around its underside no sound no movement we watched it for quite some time then the lights went out with out a sound it shot up in the blink of an eye till it looked like a star stopped dead then shot off at a90 degree angle towards manchester
content.summary: Driving home with freind seen object ahead stopped direcly underneath it clearly see it was a dull silver gun metal colour , well lit up under side no sound at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning to my car after an event that had stretched late into the night. my vehicle was parked in a field where multiple cars had been parked. while walking to within a few feet of my vehicle, i briefly looked up at the night sky and saw one star-like object moving at an incredibly high speed. the object appeared to originate in the eastern sky and was heading west. the object was a bright gold/yellow color and did not appear to leave any sort of trail.
the object moved in a slightly erratic manner as it traversed the entire length of the visible sky. unlike shooting stars, the object made small and abrupt deviations from it's path but never came to a stop. frozen in shock, i observed the first object for no more than 15-20 seconds before it disappeared in the west. just as the first object disappeared, i observed two more objects identical to the first one originate in the east at around the same point i originally observed the first object. the two objects, at a considerable distance from one another, traveled across the sky in much the same way as the first one did. they also had the same shape, size, and color as the first object.
one of my friends happened to be getting into his vehicle nearby and it was at that point that i attempted to get his attention in hopes he could see the same thing. unfortunately, he did not understand what i was saying at first and by the time he looked up the objects had already completely traversed the sky.
i remained at my vehicle for approximately thirty minutes and monitored the sky before leaving. i did not observe any other unusual objects.

the entire sequence of events from the sighting of the first object to the disappearance of the second and third objects was approximately 40 seconds.

i am just now reporting this incident after 6 years. i feel that reporting the incident publicly could affect my professional standing and i've decided to remain anonymous. it has deeply influenced my views on the world, as the objects did not move like anything i've ever seen before. the objects, in my opinion, acted as if directed by some sort of intelligence. the erratic movements of the objects were inconsistent with the behavior of shooting stars and the incredibly fast movement of the objects ruled out conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Three organge and gold orb/star-like streaks moving erratically across sky

content.detailedDescription: My mother(maureen hunt) and sister(danielle mcculloch) left my grandparents house, in the evening. it was dark clear sky, littered with stars! as we got into the car something court my eye. what i seen or what i believed i seen was a light orbiting a star, it seemed so far away!!! i pointed it out to my mum, which she dismissed as just a star. we were now traveling back home, i don't know why but i was fixated on this star! i started to get excited as it seemed to have become a single object which was now looking more like an aircraft in the far distance at night. we are now half way home an the craft was now a lot closer, whilest this was going on i was giving my mother a running commentary. at the time my mum never seemed that bothered about it, she would reply saying 'it was a helicopter or something!'. we have spoke about it many times since and she tells me she was alarmed, i think i was to excited to notice at the time! by now the craft was very visible, and seemed to be following our car, which was very strange! as we turned into the main estate before our own there is a canal that runs parallel with the road, distance between them are no more then 20 meters. as we drove next to the canal the craft was matching our speed and was above the water  which i could make out the shape which was a triangle, with three bright lights on the corners. as we approach the bend of the road the craft seems to follow the canal which goes of in the opposite direction. at this time i stared to quiz my mum about what we seen. we approached the house, drove up the short drive, stopped and got out the car. as i looked towards my mum on the other side of the car i seen the craft fly silently towards us! it must have been 50 60 feet in the sky no sound no down draft. it stops, right above us, in a blink of an eye it shot off with incredible speed. i ran from the car to the back garden, nothing, the dog was going crazy! when i spk to my mum an sister we have slight differences about the end. mine is that my sister was crying in the car but never got out!  when we speak about this she said she was out the car??? when talking about the incident i can give a better account. i have a military background, the years served i have never come across any vehicle with the capabilities of the one seen in my above statement. also i apologise, but the date is approx.
content.summary: Why did it seem to choose us? it was like a test!

content.detailedDescription: Was in back yard at around 12:00 midnight and noticed a bright orange light in sky directly above my position. above the light i could make out a triangle shape dark gray object. the object was moving at a moderate speed, (maybe a little faster than a small aircraft), going west to east in a straight line making no noise. i did return to my house to grab my camera but object had disappeared, which was odd as i was only gone for seconds.
content.summary: Observed bright orange light directly above, triangle object, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Was waiting in the shaws parkinglot when i saw i bright flash in the sky that seemed to last for a second and 1/2. it flashed into view and out if view quite fast. like a football shaped, traffic-cone-orange light being turned on then off a second later; but you could tell it had substance.
content.summary: It flashed into view and out if view quite fast. like a football shaped dark orange light being turned on then off a second later.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to smoke a cig at 1:30 in the morning, looked up and saw an extremely fast moving dark/shadowy red rectangular object moving from west to east, this thing was huge, depending on the altitude which i cannot precisely estimate, although i believe it was pretty high up, i would guess it's size at a football field or greater, no sound, no lights
content.summary: Very fast moving, dull dark  blood red rectangle

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i went out to smoke a cigarette with her adult aged son shortly before midnight on may 15th, 2012. looking due east at about a 30 degree angle from my view point a bright orange light just came on as if somebody turned on a light switch.  it hovered for a secong then slowly started to rise in alititude to about a 40 degree angle. then the light simply went out. the entire event lasted about 3 minutes.  there were planes in the area, in fact one passed directly below the light from my vantage point.  this was no airplane or helicopter.  there was no sound from it at all.  there were no additional lights of any kind that you would normally associate with an aircraft other than the solid orange light. i know aircraft and this was no aircraft that i am familiar with.  i live in the flight path of port columbus airport and i see alot of planes and helicopters. it was a good distance away from me so i am unable to give an actual determination of distance.  it was not a meteor but there was one witnessed earlier in the evening that glowed a bright green color as it burned up.  there was no cloud cover so the light could not have gotten lost in a cloud.  it was about the color of mars in the night sky and it was a steady light, not flashing or pulsing.  it was about the size and intesity of venus in the night sky.  the entire event was witnessed by all three of us.  i nad her son looked for the object until about 12:30 am but it never showed its self again. i am an amateur astronomer and i am familiar with the things associated with the night sky.  this was not a planet, star, comet, or meteor.
content.summary: Glowing orange light

content.detailedDescription: I dropped my husband of at work about 3 miles outside of town as i got to the end of the driveway i saw 4 blue/white lights on the ground in the yard across the street as i looked at them about 3-4 feet above a blue-green light pulsated as if under rippling water the light started on the left changed color to a dull yellow in the middle and then back to blue green on the right it did this about 3 times.My first thought was this is not normal so i turned left on the road and started to drive fast to get out of there, i looked into my rear-view mirror and and it lifted about ten feet off the ground the bottom angled toward me and on the bottom there was a very bright orange red light it sped up with the bottom angled toward me and was following my car i barely stopped at the stop sign and turned left, i thought it had stopped but i looked in my mirror again and it was chasing me i sped up to about 65 and it stayed within 20 ft of my car, i got to the end of the road and turned right at this point i was at the edge of the city and it's lights disappeared. i did not see it after that.
content.summary: I saw it on the ground and it chased my car for about 1 mile no more than 20 ft behind me

content.detailedDescription: may 15th 2012. i was taking my nightly jog, in springfield, missouri between 9-10 p.M. location walnut lawn, scenic, and golden street area. i looked up and noticed this orb like bright light, similar to a star, illuminating in the sky. it hovered, did swirl like maneuvers, then hovered, darted in different directions slow and at high rates of speed, then disappeared. tried to video tape it on iphone but would not pick up at the time.
content.summary: May 15th 2012 est. 9:30 p,m, saw bright orb like object hovering, did swirling maneuvers, moved in different directions at slow and high rates of speed, then disappeared. cell phone acted up and could not video. i know what i saw...Definitely strange.

content.detailedDescription:
I was guided outside looked up above me & saw light flash a few times - then flew str8up.
grabbed a fudgesicle & went out to the balcony.
ate some. looked up & saw bright light above me. 
pulsated a few times & slowly rose out of sight.
bright whitish purple light. it happened within minutes. or seconds.
after it left?
guess? i was in shock then i started weeping. 
i became very thankful & got the hello i've wanted.

before i went outside i was listening to channeled messages from the galactic federation of light. the message really hit home. i needed to walk away from my computer. so i went outside.
content.summary: I was guided outside looked up above me & saw light flash a few times - then flew str8up

content.detailedDescription:
Around 935pm pst on may 14th, 2012 i was at home with my wife shortly after dark with clear skys when she noticed a glowing red-orange/fire colored ball moving across the sky and she asked me 'what is that a meteor?' i came into our dining room that overlooks the city at an elevation of about 60-80 feet above the town with an over the treetop view and noticed the object.  

my first reaction was not of a helicopter or a plane because it was a constant 'glow' and was almost the color and appearance of a fireball. the approximate height off the ground was low at around 200 feet and a constant elevation in the direction of travel. the path it was on was generally coming from west-northwest to east-southeast.  the distance we observed it from was about a half-mile that i estimated with a landmark in the background and an approximation using google earth.  the speed was faster than a helicopter/small plane and i could best describe it as 'swift and deliberate' like its azimuth/direction of flight.  it was not headed to our municipal airport which is south of our location with a different line of approach. 

i went to grab my smartphone with the camcorder on it and went outside to our front patio deck which is right outside the dining room window that we were observing the orb object. i could not hear any sound of an engine or a rotor. on any other clear night like this one we can pick up sounds of speeding cars on the busy mall area below us and helicopter rotor sounds at the hospital a mile away.  at this point i attempted to get a video of the object but it was moving quickly and the camcorder on the phone did not have the zoom capability so i caught some video of black night sky as it was moving away from our location.  the duration of the observation of the object in its visible path was about 30 seconds. the approximate azimuth/direction of the object's travel when drawn out as a line on google earth shows it heading in the direction roughly south of mt. adams here in washington state.

that is the best summary i have for the event. nothing else as far as phenomenon was related to this observation at our location or over the town. this is the first time my wife and i have seen something like this event. i felt it was appropriate to report it to the scientific community on this site that it may be helpful to someones research.  we have not told any media sources of this incident and have no plans to do so.
content.summary: Orange orb with glow moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my drive way , at home.
i looked up saw this bright object
i thought it was a very bright star
it seemed to hover for 3 hours and then moved east direction
i felt like i was seeing something from another world. very excited and confused. 
object moved away after 3 hours. it went slow to the east and was seen all over fresno and area. multiple witness. i filmed it for an hour. it was on the news in fresno.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Ufo over fresno day time morphing

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting around our fire pit enjoying then nice evening.  when i went to look for a very bright star to the west.  when i looked into the sky i saw these two pulsating orange color orbs came from the south west heading north east  no sound traveling quite fast.  pass behind trees and only one came out and then that one just fizzled out...  i couldnt take my eyes off of them.  i have never seen anything like this.  it was not an air plane or a helicopter it didnt make a sound.  the two objects stayed the same length apart.  it was the weirdest thing i ever saw.
content.summary: Two pulsating orange color orbs came from the south west heading north east  no sound traveling

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this at 8:45 in eastern pennsylvania- there were approximately seven glowing orbs, all in a perfectly straight row, flying against the wind. we were just talking and then looked up and saw three in the sky.  we continued to observe and saw others appear as if from no where.  then they just disappeared into a cloud. they were moving only﻿ slightly slower than a plane, but there was no sound at all.  they did not appear to be floating lanterns due to the strange flight pattern.  my friend and i attempted to get closer to them, and the appeared the same the closer we got.
content.summary: Multiple glowing orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on sunday, may 13th, 2012 at approx 9:35 pm. when i walked 1 block from my house, i noticed something strange in the sky. the object was approx. 75-100 feet away in distance, elevated approx 5 stories (slightly above a house). this circular object was approx. as wide as a normal row home, hovering around 10-15 feet above the rooftops. it had a green glow around it, with blinking red and blue lights around it. i was able to snap one picture, though it was poor quality, before the object dissappeared.
content.summary: While i was walking my dog, i noticed someting strange in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 ufo 1 at my 10, 12  & 02 o���clocks. the 02 & 12 o���clock ufo���s were white orb���s, the 10 o���clock was a gray shiny metallic long cylinder shape one end pointing up and the other down. they ufo���s hovered for about 20 minutes and slowly moved east until they were out of site. they���re altitude was about 2000 ft. asl.
content.summary: 2 white orb's gray shiny metallic long cylinder

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work going north east from lockport to niagara falls ny at 945am. i noticed a bright white object on my right side, perhaps a mile or more from me around 800-1000 feet up. the sky was blue no clouds what so ever. i thought at first it was a small plane but realized it wasn't moving. i continued to watch the object that i would describe as a completely white cylinder with no visible lights windows or propellant devices. this sighting lasted a mere 5 minutes before completely vanishing from sight. leaving no trace of direction... i would describe it as if it went invisible in a split second. this sighting is my second in this area and both times involved a white cylinder shaped object first in the sky then vanishing. weird as hell to say the least.
content.summary: Saw white cylinder shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the carpool lot with my husband waiting for our daughter to be dropped off to us and while chatting and listening to the radio, we were just stargazing what few stars were visible at the time. as we were watching we looked at a very bright star, and just as i asked if he saw how bright the star was, i saw it quickly zoom in a southerly direction for about an inch and a half (in comparison to viewing it through the truck's windshield glass) before just disappearing. it almost seemed to get smaller before it disappeared as if it had turned toward space and away from earth. i asked my husband if he had seen the object and he denied it at first, until our daughter was safely in bed and sleeping when he admitted to me that he really had seen it but didn't want to freak me out. to test our sightings together, since i had tried to show him while we were seated in the truck, i asked him to describe what he saw... and it was exactly what i saw. he even gave details that i hadn't mentioned like how it was first seen just below a power line from our point of view and also how it looked like it got smaller before disappearing. i hadn't mentioned those things when spotting it and trying to show him. i believe that we both witnessed a ufo that evening.
content.summary: Saw a starlike object hovering over west horizon that shot off to the south and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Not much information, also impossible to take a great or defined photo

me and my wife and my mother in law could verified what seemed first somekind of aircraft aproaching at some distance from the new year firework in monte gordo beach but then we started to think that was rather some part of it, like a not exploded rocket....Then we start to be sure that it was commanded. sometimes this light that was orange, sometimes pulsating, was more near to the firework sometimes avoid the highest rocket's...And was always moving up and down like it was joking with it. it exhibited acceleration pattern's that showed us that it was no common aircraft. sound? it is impossible to say because of the rumble of the firework. around 5 minuts observation until it started moving south in a descent pattern until it disappeared in the horizon or sea (landing?) before the firework ended. we payed more attention to him then the whole firework...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Moving star ufo interested in new year firework's
content.locationName: Vila Real de Santo António, Faro

content.detailedDescription:
I never thought i could live this one time...

when travelling i was going to temple bar zone in the center of dublin and stopped near the liffey river for a while. it is not a really secured zone at that time of the night and i was only with my cellphone. i wish i could have my camera. it would be amazing.

i have to say i didn't drinked anything ( just for those who know temple bar aerea :) )...After this sighting yes i've drinked a lot.

anyway, when near the river i started noticing what i thought it was a sea flare rocket fired from the sea direction ( east )...I never seen one before and keep watching. the supposed flare started to be very bright in orange colour...I supposed that was normal, although i only see them in the movies ( they use to be red ). in a few seconds the bright light expanded, became bigger and i saw it was heading for the city, to my location. i don't remember to cross the road, neither if there was vehicles but i did, always staring at it. i grab my telephone. i was now near a building  at a cross, with a way of escape ( i was a little scared ) because the light was not a light already. i was seeing a really disc ufo with the orange light at one edge and a fuzzy base like fog rotating in brown colour. this was a really phisical disc, except from that base that was like a cloud moving.No sound, to slow hovered above my head ( i toke a photo but the cellphone only show the bright light )....Changed direction and crossed the river ( it inclined always to change the direction ) then stopped inclined in the sky just no more then 10 meters away from me and spotted a blue beam to the main monument in the center of dublin ( i don't remember the name - it's like a big antenna ). then rotated the beam to the opposite site of the river above the buildings and started moving again like slow motion. stopped again and then , well then it makes a full ascend until 40 / 50 meters altitude and dive in full speed out of sight to west / northwest. the object seemed to have a exploring pattern and if i wasn't shure of what i saw i could be tempted to compare the blue beam light similar to the lights police helicopters use in hollywood movies but no...It was really a disc object. also the speed in the final moments and the absent of any sound cleared all my doubts as the proximity to the object. i wish only i had a better photo, really. just one thing: please remember...I'm sure more people must have seen something. i was in almost shock, i was alone in a foreign country, i was near bar's and i don't told anyone. anyway i believe i was not the only one. i stated in the mufon report it seems reality was modified because no one seemed to notice, semmed that the time stopped like i was seing a movie, i really don't imagine how i crossed the road ( no traffic ? ) this was amazing, seemed the whole experience resumed to me and that object. i will never forget. thanks if you, et's see this report someday. please come back and show yourself again.And don't fear mankind...There are good peacefull people too
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange behaviour ufo beamed light to ground in dublin (ireland)

content.detailedDescription:
Since last year when i video tapped one just like this one. ive been intrigued with looking up and catching the moving stars.
 on may 10,2012 around 8:40pm i was outside facing east when i noticed a star moving south (t.J,mexico direction) towards the north as it passed in front of my view it dropped rapidly(what looked like 2 inches) and became 4 to 5 times the size of a basic star and grew very bright, like a truck light. as it was moving towards me i felt the need to look at it all the way through. until all the hairs on my body lifted then it ascended and continued north..It almost looked like it never left just stayed farther.
then i ran in to the house and told my sister and 2 kids what i had seen. (i have last years video which was identical to this one. just opposite direction but on video!)
content.summary: South to north path until reached in front of me and decended towards with a bright light for about 2 sec, lights when of and went right back up and away..

content.detailedDescription: Last night at about 10:00 pm my friend called me quite excited and told me to go outside and look to the south because there were ufos in the sky. he was at se 39th (cesar chavez) and woodstock, and i was at se 43rd and holgate. he stated that there were 3 craft in the sky, but by the time i made it to where i could see the southern sky,my friend said the ufo had disappeared and there were only two military aircraft visible.  i could tell that they were military because they moved very slow and silently, and had the shape of a stealth or something (kind of like a flying wing shape) but they also had the traditional faa required flashing lights on the wings. they moved slowly toward me from the south and then made a sharp turn almost directly over my position and started moving south east. i had never seen an airplane move so slowly and silently, although i didn't see the ufo i definitely saw the military aircraft that were flying with/chasing the ufo. my friend saw the actual ufo and military aircraft from his position at 39th and woodstock, my girlfriend and i saw the military aircraft from our position at 43rd and holgate, and my mother saw the military aircraft from her position at 33rd and holgate.You can contact me if you want any more details.
content.summary: Ufo seen being chased by military aircraft over portland oregon on may 14th at 10pm

content.detailedDescription: Trip around uk, after being in loch ness i've stopped to dinner at fort william, loch ness. before taking this photo have been a road accident 15 miles north of the current town. the object was noticed... don't seem like a helicopter. no birds observed but at that hour lots of mosquitos, but the object seem far away. i've iniatilly thought of a lamp but if you check negative that's not it.
content.summary: Photographic discover - not changed photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to yakima, wa from sunnyside wa on interstate 82 when i noticed a bright light about the size of the biggest star in the sky. i thought thats strange ive never seen that star there before and continued driving. 20 minutes later i noticed the exact same light about 60 degrees to the left and thought what the hell is going on. as i drove i couldnt help but just stare at this light, while staring at the light it abruptly vanished only to reappear 10 seconds later about 30 degrees to the right. at that point i had the chills and didnt kmow what it could possibly be. i watched it for another 12 miles til it went behind one the big hills over selah, wa. dont know what it was but i really want to know what can move and vanish like that. just to add there is a military training base in yakima wa, possibly it could have been a military test of some sort.
content.summary: Saw a floating light hover then move in a couple directions before floating away.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to yakima, wa from sunnyside wa on interstate 82 when i noticed a bright light about the size of the biggest star in the sky. i thought thats strange ive never seen that star there before and continued driving. 20 minutes later i noticed the exact same light about 60 degrees to the left and thought what the hell is going on. as i drove i couldnt help but just stare at this light, while staring at the light it abruptly vanished only to reappear 10 seconds later about 30 degrees to the right. at that point i had the chills and didnt kmow what it could possibly be. i watched it for another 12 miles til it went behind one the big hills over selah, wa. dont know what it was but i really want to know what can move and vanish like that. just to add there is a military training base in yakima wa, possibly it could have been a military test of some sort.
content.summary: Saw a floating light hover then move in a couple directions before floating away.

content.detailedDescription:
I had uploaded a video with ufo events that had happened last week may 10th, i am very alert daily now & will go purchase a tripod, and get my hidef camera ready, as when i drive, i carry my iphone with me. this time it was sunday may 13th. i went out to the dollar store around my street in paterson, nj. it was around 7:30pm, a bit cloudy but still very light, when i spot a craft, it caught my attention because 1. i know automatically how airplane look like, and the manner this craft was flying was extremely off, almost like it was flying sideways in a straight line. i was alarmed as well, because we are a few miles from newark liberty airport and it was not headed that way, as it flew (again very slowly) it gradually slowed down some more. i immediately grabbed my iphone and recorded, my hands were shaking a bit because i parked on a handicap spot and got on top of my sit so that i may record from my car's sunroof. i have added screen grabs of the vide as well to show you key spots so you know where to look following it's path. lasted about 30seconds on the video then it vanished into thin  air. video recorded iphone 3gs, screen-grabs have object circled in red. no way that it was an airplane, a weather balloon or a satellite. i also checked the flights itineraries for that day, no flights were to be expected until 45minutes after the craft appeared. 

p.S. i added 6 pictures, they are in order by number as the craft appeared until it vanished. photo #6 is marked as last frame seen
content.summary: Solid light gray object

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba mirando por la ventana la noche fria y relampagosa que estaba haciendo a eso de las 9:15 de la noche del 12 de mayo de 2012, me sorprendi al ver hacia el sur oriente una estrella roja en una zona que no habian nubes, tenia a mi bebe cargada y le mostre la estrella roja, pense que era marte, pero me di rapidamente cuenta de que no era una estrella cuando vi que avanzaba hacia la direccion donde yo estaba, lo hacia lentamente, mire bien si era un avion, pero nunca habia visto un avion circular y de color rojo todo el tiempo a una velocidad muy lenta, ademas se estacionaba por varios minutos en un solo punto, cuando estaba cerca observe que unas luces blancas y azules salian de lo que parecia una estrella roja, estas salian por tres lados diferentes y parpadeaban parecido a los aviones, pero estoy seguro de que no era un avion, fui corriendo a buscar mi camara pero cuando fui a observar una nube lo estaba ocultando y a pesar de que espere un buen rato, no volvi a ver nada.

no es la primera vez que observo cosas extra���as en el cielo y senti alegria de ser afortunado de haber tenido este avistamiento, rapidamente fui a consultar en internet sobre avistamiento de objetos en forma de estrellas rojas y encontre mucha informacion, incluso imagenes y videos similares a lo que habia observado.
content.summary: Estrella roja con tres luces a los lados
